IFormat module

class IFormat.IFormat(data: bytes, ssn: int = 0, rsn: int = 0, direction: str = 'OUT')[source]

Bases: Frame

IFormat class represents a specific format of data packet. It inherits from the Frame class.

classmethod get_class_ssn() → int[source]

Get the class level SSN.

Returns: int: Class level SSN.

Set the class level SSN.

Parameters: ssn (int): New value for class level SSN.

Get the class level RSN.

Returns: int: Class level RSN.

Set the class level RSN.

Parameters: rsn (int): New value for class level RSN.

Get the SSN.

Returns: int: SSN.

property rsn: int

Get the RSN.

Returns: int: RSN.

property data: bytes

Get the data.

Returns: bytes: Data.

property length: int

Get the total length of the packet.

Returns: int: Total length of the packet.

Get the length of the data.

Parameters: structure: Structure from which to extract data.
